Header: Poojith and Hemasiri arrested by the CID
Content: The Police say that IGP Pujith Jayasundara and former Defense Secretary Hemasiri Fernando have been arrested by the CID on the instructions of the Attorney General. Police Media spokesman SP RuwanGunasekara speaking to the media said that the CID commenced an investigation on the IGP PujithJayasundara, has been sent on compulsory leave and former Defense Secretary Hemasiri Fernando. They had been informed to appear before the CID at 10 am today. But they had not appeared before the CID and Hemasiri Fernando had admitted to the National Hospital and PujithJaysundara to Police hospital. According to the Police spokesman, Hemasiri Fernando and PujithJaysundara are in the two hospitals under the CID custody.
